title: Starmer rejects EU customs union after Lammy comments
description: It comes after the deputy prime minister said countries in a customs union with the EU see benefits.
content:
Sir Keir Starmer has repeated that he is not planning to rejoin the EU's customs union, after the deputy prime minister said countries in such unions see a boost to their economies.
Speaking on a podcast on Thursday, David Lammy said it was "self-evi... [2090 chars]

title: Reform UK revokes membership of council leader accused of racism
description: Party removes Ian Cooper after he was alleged to have abused Sadiq Khan, David Lammy and other figures online
content:
Nigel Farage has revoked the party membership of a Reform UK council leader accused of racially abusing Sadiq Khan, David Lammy and other public figures online.
Ian Cooper, the leader of Staffordshire county council, allegedly called the London mayor... [3520 chars]

title: Trump awarded inaugural Fifa peace prize at World Cup draw in Washington
description: US president receives new Fifa honour as scrutiny grows over Infantino’s political alliances and Trump’s disputed record on global conflicts
content:
Donald Trump has been named the first winner of the newly created Fifa peace prize, claiming “the world is a safer place now” as he received the award at the draw for the 2026 World Cup in Washington DC.
Gianni Infantino, the Fifa president and one o... [4803 chars]

title: Mixed messages on prostate cancer testing proved deadly for my husband
description: Letters: Conflicting advice on whether all men should be tested – and around the test’s reliability – can have heartbreaking consequences, writes Pat Sharpe
content: My husband died of prostate cancer in August, and I read your coverage of the UK National Screening Committee’s recommendations with dread (Expert panel advises against prostate cancer screening for most men in UK, 28 November). I believe the mixed m... [1687 chars]

title: Gloucester man found guilty of murder after triple stabbing attack
description: Kane Kotwica has been found guilty of murdering a "loving" father in a drug-fuelled attack.
content:
A man has been found guilty of murdering a "much-loved father" and stabbing two others in what police described as a "pre-meditated and cowardly" incident.
Kane Kotwica, 39, stabbed Matthew Cainey, 53, to death in an attack captured on a doorbell cam... [917 chars]
